title: She Wanted It All: A True Story of Sex, Murder, and a Texas Millionaire
description: Trophy wife Celeste Beard wasn't satisfied with a luxurious lifestyle and her rich Austin media mogul husband's devotion -- so she took his life!The wife:She wanted everything, but her husband stood in the way.The lesbian lover:A love-struck, middle-aged woman with a history of mental illness, she would do anything to set Celeste free.The beauty salon receptionist:Celeste hired her to tie up the loose ends ... in a second conspiracy to commit murder.
author: Kathryn Casey
